org.pipservices.runtime.config

Class ComponentConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.runtime.config.ComponentConfig

  • public class ComponentConfig
extends Object
    Stores configuration for microservice component
    Since:
    2016-06-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergey Seroukhov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentConfig()
      Creates an empty component configuration This constructor is used in testing
      ComponentConfig(String category, DynamicMap content)
      Creates instance of component configuration with values retrieved from microservice configuration section.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ComponentConfig fromTuples(Object... tuples)
      Creates component configuration using hardcoded parameters.
      static ComponentConfig fromValue(Object value)
      Creates component configuration using free-form objects.
      Connection getConnection()
      Gets connection parameters from 'connection' object or with parameters from the root object.
      List<Connection> getConnections()
      Gets a list of database connections from 'connections' or 'connection' objects This method is usually used by persistence components that may connect to one of few database servers.
      ComponentDescriptor getDescriptor()
      Gets component descriptor.
      Endpoint getEndpoint()
      Gets a service endpoint from 'endpoint' object or with parameters from the root object.
      List<Endpoint> getEndpoints()
      Gets a list of service endpoint from 'endpoints' or 'endpoint' objects or with parameters from the root object.
      DynamicMap getOptions()
      Gets component free-form configuration options.
      DynamicMap getRawContent()
      Gets the raw content of the configuration as dynamic map
      ComponentConfig withDefaults(DynamicMap defaultContent)
      Sets default values to the configuration
      ComponentConfig withDefaultTuples(Object... defaultTuples)
      Sets default values to the configuration

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentConfig

        public ComponentConfig()
        Creates an empty component configuration This constructor is used in testing

      • ComponentConfig

        public ComponentConfig(String category,
                       DynamicMap content)
        Creates instance of component configuration with values retrieved from microservice configuration section.
        Parameters:
        category - a component category
        content - configuration parameters

    • Method Detail

      • getRawContent

        public DynamicMap getRawContent()
        Gets the raw content of the configuration as dynamic map
        Returns:
        dynamic map with all component configuration parameters.

      • withDefaults

        public ComponentConfig withDefaults(DynamicMap defaultContent)
        Sets default values to the configuration
        Parameters:
        defaultContent - default configuration
        Returns:
        a reference to this configuration for chaining or passing through.

      • withDefaultTuples

        public ComponentConfig withDefaultTuples(Object... defaultTuples)
        Sets default values to the configuration
        Parameters:
        defaultsTuples - default configuration represented by + tuples
        Returns:
        a reference to this configuration for chaining or passing through.

      • getDescriptor

        public ComponentDescriptor getDescriptor()
        Gets component descriptor. It is read from 'descriptor' object if it exists. If not, then the descriptor is created based on fields of the root object.
        Returns:
        the component descriptor

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()
        Gets connection parameters from 'connection' object or with parameters from the root object. This method is usually used by persistence components to get connections to databases.
        Returns:
        database connection parameters or null if connection is not set

      • getConnections

        public List<Connection> getConnections()
        Gets a list of database connections from 'connections' or 'connection' objects This method is usually used by persistence components that may connect to one of few database servers.
        Returns:
        a list with database connections

      • getEndpoint

        public Endpoint getEndpoint()
        Gets a service endpoint from 'endpoint' object or with parameters from the root object. This method is usually used by services that need to bind to a single endpoint.
        Returns:
        a service endpoint or null if endpoint is not set

      • getEndpoints

        public List<Endpoint> getEndpoints()
        Gets a list of service endpoint from 'endpoints' or 'endpoint' objects or with parameters from the root object. This method is usually used by clients that may connect to one of few services.
        Returns:
        a list with service endpoints

      • getOptions

        public DynamicMap getOptions()
        Gets component free-form configuration options. The options are read from 'options', 'settings' or 'params' objects. If they are not found, then options are created using fields from the root object.
        Returns:
        a map with free-form component options or null when options are not set.

      • fromValue

        public static ComponentConfig fromValue(Object value)
        Creates component configuration using free-form objects. This method of configuration is usually used during testing. The configuration is created with 'Undefined' category since it's not used to create a component.
        Parameters:
        value - a free-form object
        Returns:
        constructed component configuration

      • fromTuples

        public static ComponentConfig fromTuples(Object... tuples)
        Creates component configuration using hardcoded parameters. This method of configuration is usually used during testing. The configuration is created with 'Undefined' category since it's not used to create a component.
        Parameters:
        tuples - configuration parameters as + tuples
        Returns:
        constructed component configuration
